meta_title: Ref. 7177 - Orfina Porsche Design – Case Finishes & Materials
meta_description: Explore the case finishes of the Orfina Porsche Design Military Chronograph Ref. 7177, featuring black Cadet PVD-coated stainless steel and original matte steel cases. Known for its rugged design, Lemania 5100 movement, and military heritage.
meta_keywords: Orfina Porsche Design 7177, Military Chronograph case finishes, Black Cadet PVD, stainless steel watch case, Lemania 5100 chronograph, Porsche Design by Orfina, 3H marking, Military issued watch, vintage Porsche design, 1980s chronograph case
info: The 7177's case is identical to that of the 7176's case, but differed in the available finishes with five distinct variations.

image.title: All 7177 Finishes
image.caption: Left To Right: Black PVD, Non-PVD Silver/Sablé, Cadet Grey PVD, Olive Green PVD, NTS PVD
image.subtitle: Left To Right: Black PVD, Non-PVD Silver/Sablé, Cadet Grey PVD, Olive Green PVD, NTS PVD
